description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.zn7arorE3VJLNYsb]{Martial Artist Dedication}

Frequency once per minute

With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride}; this movement doesn’t trigger reactions. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} up to three times at any point during your movement, each against a different enemy.

Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but your multiple attack penalty doesn’t increase until you have made all your attacks.
